name: LDAP
description: LDAP plugin fetches users from provided Search Base path. It also supports Add to group and Remove from group action on users.

configuration.label: Server Address
configuration.description: LDAP Server Address IP or DNS. e.g. ldaptest.ldap.local, 197.207.132.170

configuration.label: Search Base
configuration.description: Base path for searching users and groups. e.g. CN=Users,DC=ldap,DC=local

configuration.label: LDAP Certificate
configuration.description: Certificate is only required for TLS protocol.
